articles.title: Rutgers fraternity shut down after hazing investigation
articles.author: Cbs News
articles.summary: TechGiant Inc. has launched its new smartphone, the Xphone Z5000, featuring a holographic display and AI assistant. Pre-orders begin next week, with shipments in early December, and the phone is priced at $1200. TechGiant CEO Jane Doe stated that the Xphone Z5000 represents a significant leap forward in mobile technology.

articles.title: FindTheMovers.com Launches to Simplify the Search for Top-Rated Movers in California
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A new online consumer guide launched on October 24, 2025, offering a resource for residents seeking vetted moving companies across California. The platform provides in-depth reviews and rankings for movers in the state's largest metro areas.

articles.title: If Your Birth Year Starts With '19,' You're Gonna Love These 39 Fall Items
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Fellow Stagg kettle has launched an electric gooseneck kettle. The kettle features five temperature presets and a gooseneck design, offering precise water flow control.

articles.title: Quest launches donut products
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Simply Good Foods has added a new product to its snack brand lineup.

articles.title: Mistral launches its own AI Studio for quick development with its European open source, proprietary models
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Mistral, a French AI startup, launched Mistral AI Studio, a production platform enabling enterprises to build, observe, and operationalize AI applications using Mistral's LLMs. This platform evolves from its earlier 'Le Platforme' and offers easier customization and fine-tuning of AI models, targeting enterprise users with some technical knowledge for AI app development and launch.

articles.title: The cloud is just somebody else's computer
articles.summary: Neato is discontinuing its five-year cloud access service for its automatic robot vacuums, effectively turning them into manual devices. This change impacts existing customers who relied on cloud-based features and violates the company's original service promise.

articles.title: The 52 Best Gifts for Dads
articles.author: Erin Schwartz
articles.summary: The article suggests Proraso's toning aftershave as a small, nice upgrade, recommended by barbers.  It also mentions the Ooni pizza oven, a compact outdoor oven reaching 950 degrees Fahrenheit. Additionally, Kobo e-reader is recommended as the best model yet, preferred for taking margin notes.

articles.title: Claude Can Remember You Now
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Anthropic is rolling out a memory feature for its Claude AI assistant. The memory feature, which allows Claude to retain information from past conversations, was initially released in September 2025 for Team and Enterprise plans and now it is available to Pro and Max subscribers. This update aims to improve Claude's ability to understand user needs and preferences over time.

articles.title: Video: World's first AI manicure launched in London
articles.author: glomex.com
articles.summary: Umia launched the world's first AI manicure in London on October 24, 2025. This innovative system uses self-service machines to paint a full set of nails in under 20 minutes. The launch event coincided with London Beauty Week.

articles.title: Tech Mahindra Unveils Refreshed Brand Identity to Mark 39 Years of Innovation and Impact  Oct. 24, 2025 20:56
articles.summary: Tech Mahindra unveiled a refreshed brand identity on its 39th anniversary. The brand refresh includes a new 'lozenge' symbol and a modern color palette, representing the company's focus on AI-led transformation and 'Scale at Speed™'. The company aims to strengthen brand recognition and reinforce its position as a future-ready partner.

articles.title: Ditch your weekend plans to binge ‘wild' Netflix crime series that's surged to number 1
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Netflix is launching new content for its streaming service, suggesting updates to its existing offerings for viewers.

articles.title: Ferrero's New Holiday Lineup Includes Festive Spins on Crunch, Keebler and More
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A candy company is launching a new range of treats for the holiday season. This introduces new products from an established company.

articles.title: What Makes Australian Yogurt Different From Any Other Type
articles.author: Ben Hillin
articles.summary: Noosa, a Colorado-based brand, introduced Australian-style yogurt to the United States after its founder discovered a passionfruit yogurt in Noosa. This yogurt is characterized by its creamy texture, achieved through a longer, slower cooking process using whole milk, differentiating it from traditional and Greek yogurts.

articles.title: Initial Brunei introduces the washroom essential range
articles.summary: Rentokil Initial Brunei has launched the Essential Range, a new line of hygiene solutions for commercial washrooms. The range addresses issues like poor air quality, hand hygiene, and cubicle cleanliness, offering practical and affordable solutions. Businesses can contact Rentokil Initial Brunei to learn more about tailoring the Essential Range to their specific needs.

articles.title: Eufy X10 Pro Omni Robot Vacuum and Mop Hits Prime Day Low Price Again
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: The Eufy X10 Pro Omni robot vacuum and mop combo is available on Amazon and directly from Eufy, with a $300 discount bringing the price down to $499.99. This robotic helper features dual oscillating brushes, an integrated water reservoir, a multifunctional dock, 8,000Pa suction power, and AI-enhanced obstacle detection, providing an efficient cleaning experience.

articles.title: Asda rolls out second 'concept' store as UK expansion continues
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Asda is expanding its George clothing range with a new concept store opening in Hull on October 31st. The store will feature George's clothing, homeware, Christmas range, and celebrity collaborations. This marks the second of 10 planned Asda George openings planned over the next year.

articles.title: Mattress Firm's early Black Friday deals have up to 72% off
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Sealy and Tempur-Pedic are offering savings on top-selling mattresses. This indicates promotional activities related to their existing product lines.

articles.title: Alai Launches AI-First Presentation Maker That Delivers Designer-Level Slides in Minutes
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Alai, a YC-backed startup, has launched an AI platform designed to create high-quality presentations with designer-level slides. The platform offers four layout variations per slide, responsive canvas, premium visual elements, and full creative control, including AI image generation. Alai offers a free plan with 200 AI credits and paid plans starting at $16 per month.

articles.title: 27 Shoes From Zappos That Really Were Made For Walking
articles.author: Lesley Chen
articles.summary: Adidas slides bring back the comfort of carefree soccer team practice days. These sandals are available in sizes 5-14 and are currently priced at $20, originally $27.95.

articles.title: The consumer categories Procter & Gamble sees broad growth in
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble is experiencing growth across its consumer categories, driven by innovation. The company launched Tide Boost recently, its biggest laundry upgrade in 20 years, and plans to introduce a new functional fiber detergent later in the year. P&G has a slew of innovation coming over the next 12 months across all categories, and they are working to improve their superiority strategy.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Full Service Salon Chair (RKH-860)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: An inventor from Virginia created the FULL SERVICE CHAIR, a product designed to enhance the customer's experience and satisfaction in salons. The chair aims to provide a more time-saving option for customers seeking personal care services.

articles.title: P&G Jumps After Earnings Beat, Beauty Leads Growth
articles.author: Moz Farooque ACCA
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble (P&G) reported organic sales growth, led by Beauty and Grooming segments, where innovation played a role. The company anticipates headwinds from tariffs and commodities but maintains its full-year sales outlook. P&G is focusing on innovation to enhance consumer value and boost category growth.

articles.title: This fabric shaver will 'revitalize your wardrobe' — and it's on sale for $16 on Amazon Canada
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the BEAUTURAL Lint Remover Fabric Shaver for $16. This cordless device revitalizes clothes by removing fuzz and lint from various fabrics, and it includes features like two speeds, a protective case, and a built-in compartment for collecting debris. Amazon shoppers have purchased over 4,000 of the product in the last month.

articles.title: Who is Ranveer Allahbadia\u0026#039;s new girlfriend Juhi Bhatt? Influencer from Dehradun, his ex Nikki Sharma ...
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: Ranveer Allahbadia has soft launched a new product.

articles.title: Business Roundup: Trader Joe's nears opening, floating sauna lifted onto Saratoga Lake
articles.author: Lilli Iannella
articles.summary: Trader Joe's in Glenmont is nearing its opening date and stocking iconic products. Kos Sauna, a floating sauna, was lifted onto Saratoga Lake and plans to open in early November. Crunch Fitness opened its second Capital Region location at Crossgates Mall, featuring various equipment and services. South End Children's Cafe completed a $10,000 office makeover to enhance its services.

articles.title: Celebrate World Champagne Day with these bottles of fizz
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: BOTB has launched a new competition featuring a four-bedroom house in Saffron Walden worth £1.3 million as the grand prize. Participants can enter for £1, with the option to take a £1 million cash alternative or earn an estimated £3,500 per month in rental income if moving in isn't desired. Entries close at the end of the month.

articles.title: 150,000 Daily Users Since Launch in July: Agnes AI Surpasses Key Milestone
articles.summary: Agnes AI launched 'Group Chat' for seamless collaboration and multimodal content creation, along with 'AI Design' for images and videos. The mobile platform also features AI-generated news. A community feature is set to launch soon.

articles.title: Amazon Will Now Help You Decide What Product Is Best For You Using AI
articles.author: Joshua Hawkins
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new AI feature called "Help Me Decide" to assist customers in product selection. This feature provides product recommendations with details about its suitability, insights from customer reviews, and alignment with past purchases. "Help Me Decide" is currently available to U.S. customers via the Amazon app on Android and iPhone, as well as the mobile browser.

articles.title: Not enough people are talking about this Windows laptop that checks all the boxes for me
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Acer's Swift 16 AI features a vibrant OLED display and all-day battery life. This product balances premium features with an affordable price.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Device to Elevate a Baby Bathtub (OSW-165)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has created the BABY TUB STEP, a device to elevate a baby bathtub for more comfortable use by parents and caregivers. The design eliminates the need to bend down while bathing an infant. The invention is available for licensing or sale through InventHelp.

articles.title: Imperial Leather Maker PZ Cussons Refutes Exit Rumours
articles.summary: PZ Cussons is investing Ksh 150 million to expand production and refresh its product portfolio in Kenya. They launched a revamped Imperial Leather range targeting younger consumers with new fragrances and pack sizes, aiming to increase market share in the Kenyan beauty and personal care market.

articles.title: McDonald's Surprises Fans With Quiet Rollout of 4 New Menu Items—Here's When You Can Try Them
articles.author: Justine Lee
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching Buffalo Ranch sauce, McCrispy Sandwiches, Buffalo Ranch Snack Wrap, and Chips Ahoy Frappé. The Buffalo Ranch items and Chips Ahoy Frappé will be available nationwide starting October 28. Early customer reviews highlight the sauce blend and excitement for the Chips Ahoy Frappé.

articles.title: Canton Fair provides platform for export-oriented companies seeking to sell domestically
org: Ningbo Cixi Import & Export Holdings Co., Ltd
articles.summary: Ningbo Cixi Import & Export Holdings Co., Ltd. launched its own brands on Chinese e-commerce platforms three years ago, adjusting product design to meet domestic standards. Freshippo, Alibaba Group's grocery arm, assisted a company in launching a new line of towels and bathrobes in the domestic market by tailoring the products to meet the needs of Chinese consumers, resulting in high sales.

articles.title: FWD Hong Kong was crowned the most-awarded insurer at the Hong Kong Insurance Awards 2025, ...
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: A company has consistently won the "Most Innovative Product/Service Award" for seven consecutive years, showcasing its ongoing product innovation. The company also received awards in all digital categories, indicating its comprehensive achievements in digital product and service offerings.

articles.title: SEO.co Expands White Label SEO Offering to Include Advanced AI SEO, Conversational SEO, and Content Gap Analysis Services
articles.author: Seattle
articles.summary: SEO.co has introduced new AI-powered SEO services: AI SEO, Conversational SEO, and content gap analysis. The AI SEO service uses algorithms and AI models for competitor analysis and content optimization, while Conversational SEO optimizes content for natural language queries and AI-driven summaries. The content gap analysis service identifies missing content topics for maximizing topical authority and organic visibility.

articles.title: ‘World's first' AI manicure launches in London
articles.author: Belfast Telegraph.co.uk
articles.summary: Umia has launched an AI manicure service, claiming it can paint nails in under 20 minutes. The company plans to launch self-service AI manicure machines across London, offering gel manicures that last 10 to 14 days in plain or patterned styles.

articles.title: Hershey rival creates first-ever dream candy combo
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: The Hershey Company continues confectionery innovation. A competitor of Hershey's is introducing a new product, marking a first for their brand that could become a recurring seasonal offering.

articles.title: 12 Yogurt Brands That Use Real Fruit
articles.author: Andy Beth Miller
articles.summary: Various yogurt brands are featured including Siggi's, Fage, Brown Cow, Noosa, Icelandic Provisions, Nancy's, Forager Project, Liberté Méditerranée, Chobani, Green Valley, Too Good & Co., and La Fermière. These brands offer a variety of yogurt products including skyr, greek yogurt, cream top yogurt, dairy-free yogurt and fruit-flavored yogurts made with real fruit and natural ingredients. Many of these yogurts contain real fruit, organic sugar, and come in various flavors.

articles.title: StartupMafia Highlights 10 Local, Lifestyle and Wellness Brands Transforming Everyday Life
articles.summary: OKDERMO curates weight-management products, including GLP-1-based treatments. Live Clean Today delivers professional cleaning services using only all-natural, non-toxic products for a sustainable and health-focused alternative.

articles.title: Could the next Xbox be more like a PC and change the future of gaming forever? Here is what we know
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing its next-generation Xbox console, codenamed Magnus, featuring a modular design for upgradable components like CPU and GPU. The new Xbox will run on Windows, maintain compatibility with existing Xbox games, and won't be restricted to a single game store, aiming for a more open gaming ecosystem.

articles.title: Epomaker's 11.11 Event: A Celebration of Engagement and Rewards
articles.author: Epomaker Inc
articles.summary: Epomaker, an innovative keyboard brand, announces the launch of an interactive event for the shopping season. This event aims to offer experiences and exclusive offers to global users.

articles.title: German brands bet on Shanghai with inaugural 'Discover Germany' market
articles.summary: The 'Discover Germany 2025' event showcases German brands in Shanghai. Karcher plans to launch multiple global debut products. Beyerdynamic opened a flagship store and develops products tailored for Chinese consumers.

articles.title: The 'Most Underrated Fast Food Item' Comes From This Surprising Chain
articles.author: Samantha Dillard
articles.summary: Sonic's Supersonic Breakfast Burrito is receiving high praise on Reddit. The burrito includes eggs, tots, Cheddar cheese, tomato, jalapeños, diced onions, and sausage, and is priced around $5.00. Customers can customize the burrito.

articles.title: RingCentral to Host Product Briefing Day at NYSE on November 5, 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: RingCentral will host a Product Briefing Day on November 5, 2025, to showcase its AI strategy and market opportunities. The event will include a product demo of RingCentral's innovative AI products and insights from customers and partners.

articles.title: GifFaceSwap AI Unveils New AI Face Swap Platform for GIFs and Images
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: GifFaceSwap AI has launched its next-generation face-swapping platform. The platform includes AI GIF Face Swap AI Multiple Face Swap , and AI Image Face Swap. The platform is designed for creators, marketers, and digital professionals.

articles.title: GifFaceSwap AI Unveils New AI Face Swap Platform for GIFs and Images
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: GifFaceSwap AI has launched its next-generation face-swapping platform featuring AI GIF Face Swap, AI Multiple Face Swap, and AI Image Face Swap. The platform allows users to perform face swaps across GIFs and still images, and it is designed for creators, marketers, and digital professionals.

articles.title: GifFaceSwap AI Unveils New AI Face Swap Platform for GIFs and Images
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: GifFaceSwap AI has launched its next-generation face-swapping platform, which includes AI GIF Face Swap, AI Multiple Face Swap, and AI Image Face Swap. These new AI-powered tools enable users to perform seamless face swaps across GIFs and still images, democratizing creative AI for creators, marketers, and digital professionals. The platform aims to enhance real-world workflows and provide high-quality results through real-time processing and adaptive image reconstruction.

articles.title: If You Avoid Cleaning Like The Plague, Reviewers Say These 27 Products Make The Process So Much Faster
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new cleaning products designed to simplify household chores. These include stain removers, air purifiers (Levoit), toilet wands (Clorox), dish soaps (Dawn Powerwash), carpet and upholstery cleaners (Bissell Little Green), and robot mops (eufy), each addressing specific cleaning needs.

articles.title: Revised plans for residential flats above North East Premier store resubmitted to council
articles.author: Chronicle Live
articles.summary: A Spar-branded convenience store was sold and subsequently relaunched as a Premier convenience store. This represents the introduction of the Premier convenience store service at the location.

articles.title: Armadale Spirits Announces Launch of Armadale Vodka Seltzer for Early 2026
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Armadale Spirits will launch Armadale Vodka Seltzer, a ready-to-drink beverage combining Armadale Vodka with seltzer, in early 2026. It will be available at QT, Fry's, and Walmart. This new product expands Armadale's portfolio into the ready-to-drink market, offering a low-calorie option with premium vodka and natural flavors.

articles.title: Free LEGO, 90s football shirts and Weird Fish in payday sale
articles.author: Tom Canning
articles.summary: Floravento Foldable Ionic Hair Dryer is on sale for £29.99, discounted from £148.99 on Amazon. Fanatics is offering up to 60% off F1 merchandise and selected Premier League club items including Liverpool shirts for £63.75. The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ 11-inch model is discounted to £158.48 on Amazon.

articles.title: How Piyush Pandey and his wife turned everyday love into the 'Googly Woogly Woosh'
articles.author: Lalit Kumar 24
articles.summary: Ponds launched the 'Googly Woogly Woosh' campaign for their cold cream in the late 1990s. The campaign, created by Piyush Pandey of Ogilvy, shifted the brand's image from sophistication to warmth and connection through a simple jingle and relatable visuals, becoming a memorable part of Indian advertising history and associating Ponds with winter care and emotional storytelling.

articles.title: Royal Stag Packaged Drinking Water Unveils #CelebrateLarge, an AI-Powered Festive Campaign with Rohit Sharma
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Seagram's Royal Stag Packaged Drinking Water announced the launch of its festive campaign.

articles.title: Your TV might need an upgrade: 5 signs it's time to move on
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: New 2025 TV models from companies like LG and Samsung come equipped with features such as AI processors, higher refresh rates, and smart operating systems. They also include improved display technologies like OLED and Mini-LED, as well as updated software systems such as Google TV, Tizen 2025, and webOS 24, offering faster performance and integrated voice assistants.

articles.title: WebFX Launches AI Brand Visibility Audit to Help Businesses Dominate AI Search
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: WebFX, a digital marketing agency, launched its AI Brand Visibility Audit service. This service helps businesses understand, track, and improve their brand's presence across AI-driven experiences and large language model platforms.

articles.title: WebFX Launches AI Brand Visibility Audit to Help Businesses Dominate AI Search
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: WebFX has launched a new service called the AI Brand Visibility Audit. This service helps businesses understand, track, and strengthen how their brands appear across AI-driven experiences by providing a comprehensive view of their content and messaging across large language model (LLM) platforms. It utilizes OmniSEO™ insights and AI data analysis to find visibility gaps, benchmark brand presence, and guide businesses toward improved discoverability in the AI era.

articles.title: 40 Problem-Solving Products To Keep You Comfy So You Don't Have To Suffer In Silence
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products designed to address everyday needs and enhance personal care. These include items such as Eos' Vanilla Cashmere shea butter body lotion for moisturizing and fragrance, E.l.f.'s Holy Hydration lip mask for lip care, and SweatBlock wipes to prevent excessive sweating. The products aim to offer solutions for comfort, hygiene, and beauty.

articles.title: AI Chat for Marketing Campaigns
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Chatly AI tools assist in marketing campaigns by generating content, creating personalized customer experiences, and optimizing campaign performance. These tools, powered by artificial intelligence, automate tasks, save time, and provide data-driven insights for improved marketing effectiveness. Businesses can scale marketing campaigns quickly and efficiently using AI chat tools.

articles.title: YSL Babycat: The Viral Perfume You Need to Know
articles.summary: YSL's Babycat fragrance, featuring vanilla interwoven with pepper, incense, and suede, signals a shift towards complex, nuanced scents. It has spurred a trend of layering fragrances, combining niche and mainstream options such as Kayali Vanilla 28, Le Labo Santal 33 and Maison Margiela Replica By The Fireplace. boomTodoro fragrance and Anime 'Demon Slayer' Fragrance were also launched.

articles.title: Nine pictures as Lidl opens brand-new store
articles.author: Digital Journalist
articles.summary: Lidl has opened a new store in Southport, featuring an in-store bakery, the 'Middle of Lidl' section, customer facilities, parking, EV chargers, and solar panels. The store opened on October 23rd and welcomed the local community for its grand opening weekend.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: The YSL Babycat Hype Is Real (And Here's Why)
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: YSL introduced Babycat, a vanilla-based fragrance, that combines spices, incense, and leather. The fragrance opens with pink and black pepper and incense, transitioning into a vanilla and suede drydown. It is recommended for fall and winter, with impressive projection and longevity.

articles.title: Pepper: Revolutionizing Marketing with AI-Driven Super Teams
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Pepper has rebranded as an AI-native marketing services company, integrating AI agents with freelance creative talent. This transformation includes a new logo, color palette, and expanded offerings to enhance storytelling capabilities. Pepper's AI-driven workflows and proprietary technology aim to provide faster, more efficient marketing services to brands like Unilever and Amazon.

articles.title: CoComelon & Headspace Debut Wiggle to Wind Down Podcast Today To Help Parents Through Daylight Savings
articles.author: Sierra County Sentinel
articles.summary: CoComelon is launching new music, including "Cozy and Cuddly," and soothing sleep products as part of its "CoComelon Can Help" bedtime initiative. This introduces new offerings from the brand focused on bedtime routines.

articles.title: Wyze's New Battery Video Doorbell Cuts The Cord
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Wyze introduced the Wyze Battery Video Doorbell, the newest addition to their video doorbell product line. This announcement signifies the launch of a new product by Wyze.

articles.title: Oreo-maker Mondelez to use new generative AI tool to slash marketing costs
articles.author: Upworthy
articles.summary: Mondelez, the maker of Oreo, will implement a new generative AI tool. This tool is intended to reduce marketing costs for the company.

articles.title: Need a new Windows 11 laptop? This $849 Acer is a sleeper hit I recommend
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Acer's Swift 16 AI features a vivid OLED display and all-day battery life, offering premium features at a reasonable price point. This highlights the product's key features and market positioning.

articles.title: BYD confirms ATL Automotive as executive dealer
articles.author: Vanassa Mckenzie
articles.summary: ATL Automotive Group, as the regional master dealer for BYD, is offering new energy vehicles (NEVs) in Jamaica and other Caribbean countries. BYD's lineup includes models like the Yuan Plus, Seal, Song Plus DM-I hybrid SUV, the Shark hybrid pickup, and the Sealion 7 all-electric performance SUV, all including warranty and service packages.

articles.title: "Literally Obsessed": Woolworths Droëwors Taco Shells Have South Africans Talking
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: Woolworths has introduced Droëwors taco shells, a snack that combines South African flavours with global food trends. The product has sparked a mix of excitement and scepticism and has gained significant attention online, with food enthusiasts eager to try it.

articles.title: STWO Launches New Functional Cosmeceutical and Health Supplement Lines -- "Democratizing Professional Quality"  Oct. 24, 2025 10:00
articles.summary: STWO Co., Ltd. has announced a brand renewal and product expansion, launching new lines of functional cosmeceuticals and premium health supplements. This includes the "High-Performance" skincare line and a premium probiotic supplement co-developed with Boryung Pharmaceutical. STWO products, previously available mainly in esthetic clinics and skincare centers, will now be offered directly to consumers through more affordable pricing.

articles.title: A bed for your phone? This IKEA mini NFC bed could help you sleep scroll-free at night
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: IKEA launched the 'Phone Sleep Collection' in the United Arab Emirates, consisting of miniature beds for smartphones equipped with NFC technology. These beds are part of a challenge within the IKEA UAE app, where users can track scroll-free time and earn vouchers. The tiny phone beds are available in UAE stores as part of a promotion when customers spend AED 750 or more.

articles.title: 8 Frozen Aldi Breakfast Items, Ranked From Worst To Best
articles.author: Julia Duda
articles.summary: Aldi offers a variety of frozen breakfast products, and TastingTable ranks them. The rankings include: Pancakes and sausage link on a stick, Sausage, egg, and cheese deep dish breakfast pizza, Pepper, uncured ham, and cheddar omelet breakfast bites, Buttermilk pancakes, Buttermilk and vanilla protein waffles, Original French toast sticks, Homestyle waffles, and Egg, sausage, cheese, and potato breakfast burrito. The review focuses on taste, texture, convenience, and the accuracy of the product description compared to the packaging.

articles.title: Aldi's subscription-free battery video doorbell only costs £17, but here's why you shouldn't buy it
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced a new battery-powered video doorbell for £17, manufactured by Reka. This doorbell features two-way audio, night vision, and water resistance, and uses a microSD card for storage, avoiding subscription fees. However, the camera resolution is only 480p, which results in low-quality video footage.

articles.title: U+유모바일, 다이소 혜택 더한 월 ‘5000원' 초가성비 요금제 선봬
articles.summary: U+ Mobile has launched a new mobile plan called '월 5000원 요금제' offering 1.5GB of data and 150 minutes of calls for 5,000 won per month. This plan includes an additional 3,000 won Daiso gift certificate monthly for 12 months. This new plan extends these benefits to lower-priced plans, and is expected to meet the needs of customers who value reasonable prices.

articles.title: 2025 Mazda3 GT Turbo: A shot of espresso under the right foot!
articles.author: Alexandra Straub
articles.summary: Mazda is launching the 2025 Mazda3 GT Turbo, featuring a SKYACTIV-G 2.5 T engine with Dynamic Pressure Turbo and optional i-ACTIV AWD system. The base MSRP starts at $33,700, with optional upgrades including engine, AWD, paint, and upholstery bringing the total to $40,645.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite 5G phone likely to launch soon: Design, specs and more
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Nothing is preparing to release a new, more affordable smartphone, potentially named Nothing Phone (3a) Lite. This follows the success of their Phone (2a) model and represents an addition to their smartphone lineup.

articles.title: PZ Cussons injects Sh150mn to grow local operations
articles.author: Kevin Rotich
articles.summary: PZ Cussons East Africa is investing Sh150 million to enhance production, distribution, and innovation, with a focus on Gen Z and millennial consumers. The company has unveiled a revamped Imperial Leather range as part of its strategy to cater to evolving consumer preferences in Kenya's beauty and personal care market.

articles.title: This is everything you need to know about the new Baby Land Cruiser
articles.author: Ayush Chakraborty
articles.summary: Toyota has unveiled the all-new Land Cruiser FJ, a compact off-roader slated to debut in Japan around mid-2026. This model expands Toyota's Land Cruiser lineup, featuring a modern design, advanced safety systems, and off-road capabilities.

articles.title: GPT Proto 2.0 Launches Revolutionary UI and Model Collection Page for Enhanced AI API Experience
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: GPT Proto launched GPT Proto 2.0, featuring a redesigned user interface and an innovative Model Collection page. The update delivers improvements in user experience, accessibility, and AI model discovery. The new dashboard serves as the command center for AI API management.

articles.title: Yandex Search Türkiye expands user base over 75% with AI
articles.author: Yenişafak English
articles.summary: Yandex Search Türkiye experienced significant growth, increasing its user base by 75% in 2025 due to the popularity of its AI-powered "Yazeka with Yandex Search" service, which was introduced in late 2024. Building on this success, Yandex plans to launch a new application specifically for Turkish users in 2026, designed as a gateway to next-generation internet services.

articles.title: Maruti Victorious Variants Explained- Which One Should You Buy
articles.summary: Maruti is launching the new Victorious car. The article compares all available trims of the Maruti Victorious, covering features, performance, safety, and value for money, to help buyers decide which variant suits them best.

articles.title: The Chinese manufacturer unveils a smartphone with liquid cooling and an 8,000mAh battery
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Redmagic, a Chinese manufacturer, has launched the Redmagic 11 Pro, a new gaming smartphone. This smartphone features an active liquid cooling system, a first for the market.

articles.title: The death of SEO: How AI is rewriting the rules of online shopping
articles.author: Justin Ramos
articles.summary: OpenAI is capitalizing on AI referrals with its new 'Instant Checkout' feature within ChatGPT, allowing direct purchases from platforms like Etsy and Shopify. This integration signals business trustworthiness to AI models and streamlines purchasing. Businesses can also integrate their product feeds into AI models like Perplexity with updated pricing, inventory, and checkout options.

articles.title: Shoppers go wild over $23 item from Big W that rivals a VERY popular $86 luxury brand: 'My holy grail'
articles.author: TAHLIA PRITCHARD
articles.summary: DB Cosmetics has launched its new 'Daylight Defence' collection, featuring an improved BB Cream SPF25, Radiance Milk Universal Tinted Serum SPF25, and Quick Stix Lip + Cheek Colour Cream SPF25. The collection is designed for a fresh, natural look with SPF protection, and is available at Big W, pharmacies, and online.

articles.title: Top Curly Hair Shampoos for Defined, Frizz-Free Curls!
articles.summary: The article promotes several new hair care products featuring sulfate-free formulas enriched with ingredients like Manuka Honey, Glycerin, Ceramides, Coconut Oil, and Hyaluronic Acid. These products aim to hydrate and define curls, reduce frizz, and provide long-lasting control for various hair types, including dry, frizzy, and curly hair. The products are available in various sizes and are marketed with benefits like being paraben-free and silicone-free.

articles.title: B Futurist Enters Strategic Distribution Partnership with Daeng Gi Meo Ri
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: B Futurist and Daeng Gi Meo Ri have entered into an official distribution agreement, where B Futurist will distribute Daeng Gi Meo Ri's Korean haircare products in select European countries. The product portfolio includes items such as the Vitalizing Shampoo, Yellow Blossom Anti-Hair Loss Treatment, and Ki Gold Premium Hair Pack, targeting scalp care, anti-hair loss, and herbal conditioning segments.

articles.title: Business News  LG Electronics Launches AI-powered LG ThinQ On Home Hub
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched LG ThinQ On, a standalone AI home hub. It understands conversations and controls appliances and IoT devices and includes the LG Shield security system.  The hub costs 246,000 won, while IoT devices range from 40,000 won to 513,000 won.

articles.title: Treat Yourself: 26 Must-Have Target Treasures
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch or introduction of new products such as Happy Hair People leave-in conditioner, ESW Beauty under-eye patches, ColourPop lip mask and scrub duo, Byoma phyto-mucin glow serum, Versed lifting and defining mascara, Aveeno foot mask and JLab wireless Bluetooth earbuds and more. The products span various categories including beauty, home decor, and technology. Each product is described with its key features, price, and promising customer reviews, indicating their recent release and appeal to consumers.

articles.title: WPP launches WPP Open Pro, a self-serve edition of its AI marketing platform
articles.author: Shilpashree Mondal 24
articles.summary: WPP has launched WPP Open Pro, a new AI marketing platform that enables brands to plan, create, and publish campaigns directly. Open Pro is designed as a self-serve complement to WPP Open, offering AI-driven tools for audience understanding, asset generation, and campaign deployment, targeting both enterprise clients and smaller businesses.

articles.title: E-assist shoes, Air jackets and more: Nike unveils daring new products to show it's innovating again
articles.author: The Oregonian
articles.summary: Nike unveiled new products, including a battery-powered walking shoe, an inflating jacket, and a sneaker that mimics the sensation of walking on grass. These introductions underscore the company's innovation reboot under CEO Elliott Hill.

articles.title: LG, Ecobank partner to drive smart living with flexible financing solutions
articles.author: Cynthia Alo
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria and Ecobank Nigeria have partnered to introduce the Easy Monthly Installment (EMI) scheme, a 'Buy Now, Pay Later' model, allowing customers to pay for LG's AI-powered Smart TVs, washing machines, refrigerators, and air conditioners over up to 24 months. This initiative aims to make LG's smart home technology more accessible to Nigerians.

articles.title: 48 Pretty, Practical, And Precious Products You'll Love
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: L'Oreal Paris has launched an illuminating moisturizer for a lightweight alternative to foundation. Monday Haircare has introduced a dry shampoo with gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Cuisinart now offers an ice cream maker to experiment with recipes. Alleyoop released a 4-in-1 makeup brush designed with an eyeshadow brush, a blush brush, a brow brush, and a blending sponge.

articles.title: All hail the driverless taxi
articles.author: Sean Thomas
articles.summary: Waymo, owned by Alphabet (Google), is launching self-driving taxi service trials in London, with paid services expected to begin next year.  Waymo's self-driving cars are reported to be at least 90% safer than human-driven cars and offer a unique travel experience that some customers prefer over traditional taxis, even with potential drawbacks like freeway limitations.

articles.title: Shoppers 'love' advent calendar after ditching chocolate for beauty
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Allbeauty launched the "12 Days of Christmas Collection" advent calendar, priced at £79.95, featuring skincare, haircare, fragrances, and a candle. Charlotte Tilbury offers the "Beauty Treasure Chest 12 Door Beauty Advent Calendar" for £175, including full-sized and mini products. Boots also has the "24 Days Of Skincare Advent Calendar" for £70, showcasing brands like Bubble, PIXI, BYOMA, Inkey List, Soap and Glory and Garnier, as well as K Beauty gems from Anua, Haruharu, Tocobo and Round Lab.

articles.title: STWO Launches New Functional Cosmeceutical and Health Supplement Lines -- "Democratizing Professional Quality"
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: STWO Co., Ltd. has announced a brand renewal and product expansion, launching new lines of functional cosmeceuticals, the "High-Performance" skincare line, and premium health supplements, including a probiotic supplement co-developed with Boryung Pharmaceutical. The company aims to make professional-grade quality accessible to everyday consumers through high-performance products at reasonable prices, expanding its retail channels to reach a broader audience.

articles.title: 25 Ways To Look A *Lot* More Put-Together With Only A *Little* Bit Of Effort
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Maybelline introduces Dream BB Cream with SPF 30 that hydrates, blurs pores, and evens out complexion. Cake Beauty launches The Curl Friend Defining Cream for glossy, frizz-free curls, blending shea butter and natural oils.

articles.title: These $300 rugged Android phones have no business being this good for the money
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Oukitel presents a new rugged phone option, aiming to combine tank-like durability with Chevy Supersport-like performance.

articles.title: WPP unveils new edition of its AI marketing platform WPP Open
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: WPP has launched WPP Open Pro, a new AI marketing platform designed to empower brands of all sizes to independently plan, create, and publish campaigns. This platform expands WPP's reach across the global advertising market and provides an efficient route for existing clients to leverage WPP's tools and capabilities. WPP Open Pro includes AI-powered strategy planning, content creation at scale, and campaign publishing capabilities.

articles.title: 27 Easy-To-Use Cleaning Products
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of new cleaning products and tools, including Bioclean stain remover, Levoit air purifier, Clorox toilet wand, Dawn Powerwash dish soap, Bissell Little Green carpet cleaner, Chom Chom pet hair remover, Wet & Forget cleaner, The Pink Stuff stain remover, Baseboard Buddy, plant-based stainless steel cleaner, Cerama-Bryte cooktop cleaning kit, Bissell CleanView bagless vacuum, Eufy robot mop and vacuum, automatic makeup brush cleaner, mold & mildew removing gel, drill scrubbing attachments, professional-strength grout cleaner, Iron Out rust stain remover, microfiber cleaning cloths, carpet cleaning solution, overnight tank cleaner, and drain clog remover, designed to simplify various cleaning tasks around the home.

articles.title: STWO Launches New Functional Cosmeceutical and Health Supplement Lines
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: STWO Co., Ltd. has launched new lines of functional cosmeceuticals, the 'High-Performance' skincare line, and premium health supplements co-developed with Boryung Pharmaceutical. This includes a seven-product 'True Solution' series for comprehensive skincare and a premium probiotic supplement for inner beauty and gut health. The company aims to provide professional-grade quality products at reasonable prices, expanding accessibility through affordable pricing and retail channels.

articles.title: OPPO: A6 Pro Breakthrough for A-series Lineup
articles.author: Nigeria
articles.summary: OPPO launched the OPPO A6 Pro, highlighting its 7,000mAh battery with 80W SUPERVOOC Flash Charge and military-grade durability. The device also features a 120Hz AMOLED display, ColorOS 15, and Trinity Engine for enhanced performance.

articles.title: LG Electronics, Ecobank Unite to Transform Homes
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria and Ecobank Nigeria are partnering to promote smart living in Nigeria. LG aims to integrate Artificial Intelligence across its product range to simplify living. Ecobank will provide flexible payment plans to make LG's AI-powered devices more accessible to Nigerians.

articles.title: 12 beauty Advent calendars to get you in the holiday spirit
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Various companies are launching beauty advent calendars for the 2025 holiday season. L'Occitane is launching a 24-day advent calendar gift set featuring a mix of new products and bestsellers. Sephora is launching premium makeup and skincare advent calendars and gift sets containing full-size makeup, skincare, and accessories. MAC Cosmetics is launching a 24 Mystery Must-Haves Advent Calendar filled with full-size and mini must-haves, including lipsticks and skincare, while Tatcha is introducing a 12 Days of Treasures Advent Calendar inspired by Japanese ritual with bestselling favorites.

articles.title: McDonald's quietly launches 3 new menu items
articles.author: Christian Saclao
articles.summary: McDonald's is rolling out new menu items, including the McCrispy Sandwich, a revamped Snack Wrap, and a new Frappé flavor. They are also introducing a Buffalo Ranch Sauce, featured in the Bacon Buffalo Ranch Deluxe McCrispy and the Buffalo Ranch Snack Wrap. Additionally, a new Chips Ahoy Frappé, combining coffee with cookie-flavored syrup and Chips Ahoy cookie pieces, is being introduced.

articles.title: Robots take center stage as Canton Fair showcases smart tech, creativity
articles.author: 许嘉怡
articles.summary: DOBOT showcased a massage robot providing on-site massages and a coffee-making automaton deployed in various locations globally. CVTE presented a robotic dog with advanced AI capabilities for climbing slopes and navigating different terrains. Yuanhua Tech demonstrated a surgical robot with high precision, having performed numerous surgeries and obtained licenses in multiple regions.

articles.title: Geely Debuts EX5 in the UK, Driving Its Expansion into Europe's Rapidly-Growing EV Segment
articles.author: Williamson Herald
articles.summary: Geely Auto launched the Geely EX5 today.

articles.title: Joint power laboratory for GigaDevice and Navitas
articles.author: Eweekly
articles.summary: GigaDevices is collaborating to deliver intelligent and high-efficiency digital power solutions for emerging markets like AI data centers, photovoltaic inverters, energy storage systems, charging infrastructure, and electric vehicles. The lab achieved several important milestones before the official launch.

articles.title: This Upgraded SteelSeries Gaming Headset Is $80 Off
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: The Arctis Nova Pro is a new, feature-packed product aimed at serious gamers.

articles.title: ‘Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake' Gets A Lovely Launch Trailer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Square Enix is launching 'Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake'. A new launch trailer for the game has been released.

articles.title: Buddy AI Labs Unveils Loody AI Companion Hub: AI Designed for Genuine Emotional Connection
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Buddy AI Labs, Inc. has launched Loody AI Companion Hub, a new visual AI device designed to foster emotional connections. Loody remembers conversations, understands user emotions, and offers personalized interactions.

articles.title: Meghan Markle teases new As Ever product as 'save the date' has fans excited
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, recently launched a Sauvignon Blanc wine. The brand is hinting at releasing another new product in the near future.

articles.title: Oreo-maker Mondelez will use AI for TV ads next year
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Mondelez is utilizing generative AI to reduce marketing costs and plans to launch AI-generated TV advertisements next year. The company has already invested over $40 million in AI.

articles.title: Your ultimate guide to glow like a Victoria's Secret supermodel
articles.author: Shreya Shah
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret emphasizes achieving a radiant look through makeup techniques and specific product recommendations. The routine involves using radiant primer or illuminating base, lightweight foundation or skin tint, followed by contouring with bronzer and applying creamy or liquid blush. To achieve a high-shine look, users can add liquid or powder highlighter and finish with a high-shine lip gloss.
